articles.title: LIVE MN - Allegri: "Every now and then Rabiot makes me angry. 50 points from the Scudetto? Eh, we have to see Inter..."

Massimiliano Allegri, Milan coach, is present at a press conference in the "Dall'Ara" stadium at the end of the Bologna-Milan match.

Follow his statements live with the live text on MilanNews.

articles.title: Rabiot to TL: "Well done everyone, nice evening. The championship? It's alive, but we must be focused on our goal"

articles.title: Milan at 50 after 23 games for the third time in the three-point era
